Sauteed Red Cabbage


Ingredients
2 tablespoons olive oil
1 small onion
1 1/2 pounds red cabbage
1/4 cup apple cider vinegar
1 tablespoon ground mustard
2 teaspoons sugar
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper

Cooking Instructions

Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion
and saute 2 minutes. Add cabbage and saute 5 minutes more.
Stir in vinegar, mustard, sugar, salt, and pepper. Saute
until cabbage is as tender as you like, about 10 minutes.
Source 

https://www.allrecipes.com/sauteed-red-cabbage-recipe-8624337

https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=Sauteed Red Cabbage
